Comments_List: I thought the course was key to understanding material science and analysis via scientific instrumentation. I was comfortable with the chemistry for a non-chemist and thought all relevant material was taught excellently and professionally.
Perhaps more time with a few more instruments, but that should be placed upon the student by using more available resources for their project.
Yes, I believe that the course is essential to Archaeology and material science aspects of it. I learned much more than I thought I would and enjoyed the class immensely.
